componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Four Trends Shaping The Future Of Pharma Packaging

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: If glass as the primary container for pharmaceuticals proves to be unsustainable, what alternatives might be more viable and how might that impact choice of label materials? This article from Forbes discusses 4 trends impacting pharmaceutical packaging.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
There are essentially two reasons to use an overlaminate: 

(1) to protect the printed graphic from damage 
(2) to add aesthetic qualities. 

Specific end-use requirements will dictate which type to use. Read The ABC's of Overlaminate Selection.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Perfecting the Wine Label

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Packaging and label design are critical for expressing a wine brand authentically while also catching the eye of consumers. Learn about current trends in this article from Labels & Labeling.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Achieve greater efficiency and optimum performance while simplifying the selection process for your next durable labeling application.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Versatility to Meet Most Durable Labeling Challenges

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Outdoor-durable polyester, polypropylenes and vinyls
  • Reliable adhesion from three top performing adhesives
  • Cross-platform printability
  • UL/cUL-recognized; CSA pending
  • Eligible for FLEXcon's adoption fee reimbursement program

componentInstanceProperties.value: UL/cUL and CSA Ready Portfolios

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Save time and money with pre-approved products. FLEXcon has the most extensive UL listing in the industry as well as the UL expertise to guide you.

componentInstanceProperties.value: Reduce complexity. Gain efficiencies. Produce great labels.

Visit our Quality page today to learn about:

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
On Medical Errors


According to a study by the Institute of Medicine, 33% of all medical errors come from labeling and packaging issues, and 30% of these errors result in fatalities.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
On Beverage Packaging


According to the Association for Packaging and Processing Technologies, 89% of beverage companies are looking to incorporate more recycled plastic materials in their packaging to support the sustainability goals of reducing global plastic pollution.
